page.title: 15CHILDREN'S GAMES, MUTHILL.
page.content: {Most widely played Games.} {Tig}-1.Chain Tig-all join hands when caught. 2.Underground Tig- duck under arch made by arm and wall.3. High Tig off ground to avoid capture.4.Hospital Tig-hold part of body touched.{Hide {and Seek.Hopscotch.}Seasonal Games- { {conkers ,marbles.} {Foxy.}-catcher turns round, anyone moving stands with arms out. When all caught,catcher tells story with the word "Foxy" in it.On the word "Foxy" spoken, all run.Person caught becomes catcher. {Vote.}-Two equal chains. Call "Vote, vote, vote for (NAME)".Child named tries to break through other chain. If successful,rejoins own team, if not, joins opposition. {Number Race.}One child thinks of a number.Child who guesses it, races with him/her that number of times.
